Title: Inside Out
Description: Eleven-year-old Riley has moved to Sans Francisco, leaving behind her life in Minnesota. She and her five core emotions, Fear, Joy, Anger, Disgust, and Sadness, struggle to cope with her new life.

Title: Mean Girls
Description: Cady joins a new public school and befriends Janis and Damian. They warn Cady to aboid the Plastics, a group led by Regina. Things get worse when she falls in love with Aaron, Regina's ex-boyfriend.
